org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.support

Class LuceneAccessorSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.support.LuceneOperationsSupport
      • org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.LuceneAccessor
        • org.springframework.data.gemfire.search.lucene.support.LuceneAccessorSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, LuceneOperations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LuceneTemplate
    Deprecated. 
    To be removed in GemFire 10 integration

    public abstract class LuceneAccessorSupport
extends LuceneAccessor
    LuceneAccessorSupport is a LuceneAccessor class implementation providing support for extending classes.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    See Also:
    LuceneAccessor

                                                                                         java.lang.String defaultField,
                                                                                         int resultLimit)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: LuceneOperations
        Executes the given Lucene query with a limit on the number of results returned.
        Specified by:
        query in interface LuceneOperations
        Overrides:
        query in class LuceneOperationsSupport
        Type Parameters:
        K - Class type of the key.
        V - Class type of the value.
        Parameters:
        query - String containing the Lucene query to execute.
        defaultField - String specifying the default field used in Lucene queries when a field is not explicitly defined in the Lucene query clause.
        resultLimit - limit on the number of query results to return.
        Returns:
        a List of LuceneResultStruct containing the query results.
        See Also:
        LuceneResultStruct, List
